greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Modulo 2 recursion switch between A000898 and A121966: A000898 first.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..731
formula: For n>=2, a(n) = a(n-1) - (n-1)*a(n-2) if n is odd, a(n) = 2*a(n-1) + 2*(n-1)*a(n-2) if n is even. - Edited by _Robert Israel_, Jun 20 2018
maple: f:= proc(n) option remember; if n::odd then procname(n-1)-(n-1)*procname(n-2) else 2*procname(n-1)+2*(n-1)*procname(n-2) fi end proc:
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Sep 11 2006
